p: FBS (Sigma) was stored at −20°C in 50 mL aliquots. L‐012 (WAKO Chemicals, Osaka, Japan) and phorbol dibutyrate (PDB) (Sigma) were dissolved in DMSO (100%) and prepared as 10 mM stock solutions in aliquots of 10, 25 and 50 μL, and stored at −20°C. Custom‐designed peptide, Cgp91ds‐TAT, was dissolved in 100% DMSO in 5 mM (10 μL) aliquots and stored at −20°C.
